sentences.english: Before it occurs, a number of schools compete for the domination of a given field.
sentences.chinese: 在它發生之前，這一領域中有許多學派在逐鹿中原。

sentences.english: Of the three competing technologies for mini projecting, which one would lead the way?
sentences.chinese: 微型投影全球逐鹿，三大技術誰主沉浮？

sentences.english: We haudio-videoen't decided when to hold the speech contest.
sentences.chinese: 我們還沒定下舉辦演講逐鹿的時間。

sentences.english: Myspace.cn will be launched in China this year and will join the existing social network competition there.
sentences.chinese: cn將在今年推出，加入社會化網絡在中國的逐鹿。

sentences.english: As a result of development in Sun Dong, did not participate in the Central Plains Guru.
sentences.chinese: 孫氏於是在江東發展，未參與中原逐鹿。

sentences.english: We haudio-videoe to train more first-clbum engineers to compete in the technology r_ design with Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我們得造就更多一流的工程師參與同日本的技術逐鹿。

sentences.english: The product gives you some edge over your competitors, I guess.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲你們的產品可以使你們勝過逐鹿對手。
